name: Bald Head
description: Performers with no hair on their head.

name: Bangs
description: Hair that hangs in front of the forehead.

name: Beard
description: Facial hair on the jaw, chin, upper lip, lower lip, cheeks, and neck

name: Braids
description: Hair that is braided in some way.

name: Curly Hair
description: Hair with significantly tighter curls along most of its length.

name: Dreadlocks
description: Hairstyle made of rope-like strands of hair.

name: Hair Bun
description: Hair tied back and kept up high.

name: Hair Pouf
description: Hair flipped back from the centre front hairline

name: Kinky Hair
description: Extremely dense, curly hair that often grows upward and outward more than it hangs down.

name: Long Hair
description: Hair that would roughly hang below their shoulders if left loose.

name: Long Hair (Female)
description: Female hair that would roughly hang below their shoulders if left loose.

name: Medium Hair
description: Hair that would roughly hang at shoulder-length if left loose.

name: Medium Hair (Female)
description: Female hair that would roughly hang at shoulder-length if left loose.

name: Mustache
description: Men's facial hair on the upper lip

name: Pigtails
description: Hair tied back into two separate hanging tails, on either side of the head.

name: Ponytail
description: Hair tied back into a single hanging tail.

name: Quiff
description: Men's hair style with short sides and a longer, voluminous top that is styled upward and back

name: Shaved Head
description: Hair that has been shaved or buzzed very close to the scalp.

name: Short Hair
description: Hair that is only long enough to frame the face, at most.

name: Short Hair (Female)
description: Female performers with hair that is only long enough to frame the face, at most.

name: Short Hair (Male)
description: Male performers with hair that is only long enough to frame the face, at most.

name: Sidecut
description: Performer has a hair style that features a shaved section on one side.

name: Space Buns
description: Hairstyle characterised by two equal-sized buns either side of the head

name: Straight Hair
description: Hair that would hang straight down if left loose.

name: Waist-length Hair
description: Hair that is long enough to approximately reach the waist

name: Wavy Hair
description: Hair that has wider, looser curls or waves for at least some of its length.

name: Wig
description: A manufactured covering of natural or synthetic hair for the head.
